name: ThirdMiracle: Turn-Base SRPG
description:
This game is a classic package style.
Stories of rebels against Empire tyranny.
Charming little girl characters and beautiful stories.

※ No automatic combat mode.
※ No network interlocking element.

The game supports English and Korean.
However, the level of translation in English is not very natural.
This game was developed by two people without capital, so it was not able to translate perfectly. :,
